Articles.Content: what types of colonies do you want

Cyclers that are also colonies; as subclass of "space colonies" I suppose.  But the idea is that a cycler type could be defined, and given the resources required being on board, that would automatically make the required burns to maintain the cycler "orbit"

All of these sound super fun but I suspect on release we'll probably 'only' have the ability to build giant space stations and anchored surface bases. Perhaps in DLCs we could see things like underwater exploration and airships/ floating colonies. Could be awesome!
Maybe after the game is released we can push for other colony types to be added in updates?

It would be cool to have floating "blimp" colonies for bodies with very thick atmospheres like Eve or Jool.

I'm only expecting surface anchored colonies and space colonies though, as those have been the ones shown.
I think all would be cool. All would be cool.

Would be very very cool if we could have  floating colonies on gas giants!
